description:
This course is the best way to create a real portfolio while getting started
as an engineer. Working with a professional frontend developer you'll build
interactive websites – including an online resume, a clone of Google's
homepage and an interactive shopping list – using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and
jQuery. Don't know what those are? Don't worry, your mentor will teach you
1-on-1.

You'll master these fundamentals with 1-on-1 guidance from your mentor who is
a professional developer. Your mentor will be there to help you when you get
stuck, motivate you to finish a challenging project, and keep you on track.
You’ll graduate with a full portfolio and a fully-stacked GitHub profile. Even
if you’ve literally never coded a single line you can take the course and
become a beginner frontend developer.
title: Frontend Web Development
